1.title: He Loves Me, He Loves Me Not
1.plot: Artists don't compromise with their art. But what about lovers? Do they compromise with their heart? Ananya, a talented interior designer, craves nothing more than Rohit's company. To mark three years of togetherness, they meet for a quite celebration. But nothing goes according to plan.

2.title: Memories Magic And Madness
2.plot: The two different worlds of Rohit Mehra collide with each other when his daughter, Bani, confronts him about Ananya. It seems Rohit will have to make a choice, as Ananya drifts apart from him. His wife, Poonam, offers him a second chance. Will Rohit be forced accept it?

3.title: Desparate Love, Guilty Hearts
3.plot: Whenever a heart breaks, no matter how young or old, the grief is the same. Poonam is devasted because this time her husband, Rohit, can't forget Ananya. Rohit feels a certain guilt, but Ananya doesn't wish to share the burden of this guilt. Meanwhile, Bani refuses to marry her long-time boyfriend Arya.

4.title: Who Am I To You?
4.plot: Is Ananya and Rohit's relationship ready to reveal itself to the world? Maybe not. But Ananya is tired of hiding their beautiful love from the world. Rohit arrives at a wedding function with his family but leaves the venue without them. This leaves his family and all the guests stunned. Meanwhile, Nikki and Bani try to secretly find out the identity of the other woman in their dad's life.

5.title: Stolen Love
5.plot: Love and life is getting increasingly suffocating for Ananya. To escape all of this, she leaves the city. Rohit desperately searches for her all over. With a motive in mind, Bani agrees to marry her boyfriend Arya. Poonam is delighted with her daughter's decision. But, her delight is short-lived when she learns about Rohit's decision.

6.title: Always An Outsider
6.plot: When the storm of divorce hits the Mehras, they are shattered. Poonam reluctantly accepts this bitter truth, while making a heartfelt appeal to Rohit. What is driving Rohit to seek divorce from Poonam? Is it something he truly desires or is it just to keep Ananya happy? Meanwhile, Bani reaches Ananya's house and is not ready for what she discovers.

7.title: The Wife's Challenge
7.plot: Is it better to live a lie for the sake of society or embrace truth for your own peace? Rohit and Poonam are divided on matters of marriage and relations. Before Rohit can get a divorce from Poonam he must fulfill her nearly impossible demand. Ananya is delighted when Rohit moves in with her. But it takes only one phone call from Poonam for him to return home and attend to his family.

8.title: Mine. Forever?
8.plot: With immense pain, Poonam and her family try to face the divorce proceedings with some dignity. But there is no dignity for Ananya in fulfilling Rohit's request, even though she is hopeful and happy with Rohit moving in. Will Poonam and Rohit legally put an end to their marriage?

9.title: Love or tug-o-war
9.plot: When two people divorce, is it right to put the blame on a third person? Nevertheless, Ananya blames herself for the pain of Poonam and her daughters. Rohit tries to meet his family, but he reaches home to find it empty. On the other hand, Nikki and Bani have a plan to get their father to realise his "mistake".

10.title: J for jealousy
10.plot: After a long time, Poonam sees a ray of happiness, as the Mehras gear up for celebrations. For Rohit, Bani's wedding is an opportunity to spend much needed quality time with his family. But arrival of Sheena Masi adds some unexpected colours to the occasion. Will Poonam and Rohit come closer?

11.title: Trials and Tribulations
11.plot: In between all the preparations and celebrations Rohit misses Ananya each and every moment. Ananya patiently waits for a call or a message from Rohit, but she is left disappointed. Sheena Masi's latest idea proves to be a masterstroke. What will Rohit do to save his relationship with Ananya?

12.title: Crossing all Boundaries
12.plot: Everyone celebrates Bani and Arya's union with lots of song and dance. All the guests have a blast on the dance floor. Over a drink or two, a little more than light hearted gossip is shared. How will the Mehras cope with the latest shocking development?

13.title: Home Alone
13.plot: Bani gets married and so does Rohit. An excited Ananya moves in with Rohit to start a new chapter of her life with the love of her life. But Rohit is still mad at Ananya and her friends. What will Ananya do to get Rohit to talk to her? When Rohit doesn't show up at his own party Ananya is going be heart-broken yet again.

14.title: New Beginnings Old Ghosts
14.plot: Some time has passed since Ananya, Rohit and Poonam's lives changed forever. Ananya is almost satisfied with her life with Rohit, and Poonam is beginning to discover a new way of life. Ananya craves for something more than just being a wife. But she struggles to express her feelings to Rohit who seem to be increasingly getting drawn to his family like never before.

15.title: Nothing Lasts Forever
15.plot: Though Poonam has accepted a life without Rohit, Ananya is yet to find acceptance with Rohit's family. A medical emergency leads to Bani's hospitalization. It is a moment for Rohit to reflect upon his priorities in life. For Ananya, it will be a choice between her career and companionship.

imdb.plot outline: What happens when a middle-aged man decides to turn the course of his life? The story of a 40-year-old married man, who is torn between choices, responsibilities and personal need. Is this a mid-life crisis or a realization of what he actually wants? Kehne Ko Humsafar Hain is an ALTBalaji Original.
imdb.title: Kehne Ko Humsafar Hain
plot: What happens when a middle-aged man decides to turn the course of his life? The story of a 40-year-old married man, who is torn between choices, responsibilities and personal need. Is this a mid-life crisis or a realization of what he actually wants? _Kehne Ko Humsafar Hain_ (qv) is an ALTBalaji Original.::ALTBalaji

A caring wife, and two loving daughters, Rohit has it all. On the outside, it looks a happy family, but behind the curtains of reality lies the actual truth, Rohit is in love with Ananya. And when the secret finally comes out, it shocks everyone involved. Will Rohit stay with Poonam, with whom he has taken marriage vows? Or will he sacrifice everything for Ananya, his true love?::ALTBalaji
